text: HRay <7zfy  <TTHTif gifearrut 7914 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (em Tar7 & {TTHNf HATT4) W4 Fax ; 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) ii-5 & 6, Ra2r-10, ERaT , T8 ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Revised Delegation of Power /2019 No. 18.35/2019, Dated the 29# March, 2019 [Decision taken by the Authority in its 136th meeting held on 21.02.2019 at Agenda Item No. 136.09] Sub: Revised delegation for award of projects on EPC & HAM Mode Authority in its 136th Meeting held on 21.02.2019 has revised the Delegation of Power issued vide policy circular no_ NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Delegation of Power/2017 No_ 18.24/2017 dated 21.08.2017 and its amendment dated 02.07.2018 to the extent as under: (_) In case of EPC Mode, if L-1 bid is upto 5% above the updated cost based on current SOR, Executive Committee is the Competent Authority to accept L-1 bid and approve the award of work: (ii) In case of HAM Mode, if L-1 bid is upto 5% above the updated bid price assessed by NHAI based on the parameters on the bid due date, Executive Committee is the Competent Authority to accept L-1 bid and approve the award of work. 2 _ The other provisions of aforesaid policy circular shall remain the same. u| 03 (V.K.
